snippet: Good news for Rick Santorum: He will probably get all the media attention he wants.
abstract: Good news for Rick Santorum: He will probably get all the media attention he wants.
lead_paragraph: The dramatic finish of the Iowa caucus -- the confirmation of a late surge in support for Rick Santorum and the eight-vote margin separating him and Mitt Romney -- brings up the question of what happens next. Here is one systematic finding:

headline.main: Candidates Who Do Better Than Expected Win More Media Attention
